Hey Ghost Jazz Trio friends and fans. I will be donating and matching 100% of all funds received for the online purchase of my new album "Dreams Above" to release in April, to the https://www.unhcr.org/en-us
their restricted emergency fund for the women, children and men in Ukraine fighting to stay a free nation and people.
The album will be available on the Ghost Jazz Trio Band website and other online platforms. Thank you for your support. If you want to pre-order the album now for $10.00 to help the Ukraine people, go to theghostjazztrioband.com website and click on the Ghost Store to place your order. I will track all purchases and alert you when the album is available to download in April.
Thank you for your caring and support for freedom.

After a gruelling three-day car journey, Olga and her children are among hundreds of thousands who have fled Ukraine to find safety in neighbouring countries in recent days.

‚ÄúWe fled as soon as the first bombs fell. It took us 12 hours just to get out of Kyiv. We‚Äôve been waiting here for 36 hours now.‚Äù

#Ukraine #Poland #WithRefugees

Photo: UNHCR/Chris Melzer

A MESSAGE FROM OUR FOUNDER PAULA GERBASE‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã.
‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã
The fast-deteriorating situation in Ukraine and ongoing military action is gravely concerning, and the humanitarian consequences on civilian populations will be devastating. There are no winners in war, but countless lives will be torn apart.‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã
 ‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã
Around 660,000 refugees have now fled Ukraine to neighbouring countries in the past six days. UNHCR, the UN Refugee Agency @refugees, is mobilizing resources to respond as quickly and effectively as possible both in the Ukraine and in neighbouring countries. ‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã
 ‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã
The website help.unhcr.org/ukraine has been created specifically to provide relevant information for asylum seekers and refugees in the region in this moment of urgency.‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã
 ‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã
For over half a century, UNHCR has helped millions of people to restart their lives. They include refugees, returnees, stateless people, the internally displaced and asylum-seekers. Their protection, shelter, health and education efforts have been crucial, healing broken pasts and building brighter futures.‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã
 ‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã
The developing refugee situation in Ukraine is of the utmost concern, and it highlights the unacceptable number of people displaced worldwide due to conflict.‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã
 ‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã
Afghans constitute one of the largest refugee populations worldwide. Some three-quarters of Afghan refugees are hosted in Iran and Pakistan, with more than 2.2 million registered refugees in the two countries. ‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã
 ‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã
The Burundian refugee situation is the lowest funded of any situation globally. In 2018, UNHCR and its partners received just 33 percent of the required US$391 million requested to support Burundian refugees. ‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã
 ‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã‚Äã
(Message continued in comments).‚Äã‚Äã

Image: 'Yesterday's Sandwich', Boris Mikhailov, 1970

Like everyone else, we are deeply heartbroken about the invasion of Ukraine and war on the European continent in the 21st century. So we donated the expected profit of today‚Äôs video to the UN Refugee Agency that directly supports Ukrainian refugees escaping to safety. And if you can spare a few bucks, you can do the same here: https://donate.unhcr.org/int/en/ukraine-emergency 
(we've also added the link to our bio)

We usually try to stay out of politics and focus on making science beautiful and accessible, but we also believe in democracy and human collaboration. And we are also fellow Europeans and this war makes us feel sad and powerless.

"I have worked in refugee crises for almost 40 years and I have rarely seen such an incredibly fast exodus of people."

High Commissioner Filippo Grandi addresses United Nations Security Council

Hello how are you all coping with the news lately? I‚Äôm sorry for the silence in the last few days. Good news I‚Äôm well again after a week of Covid! ‚ò∫Ô∏è

But shortly after my sister and her husband and two children arrived in Bangkok they all tested + and have been in state run quarantine facility since, leaving our 90yo grandad at home with his carer. On Monday he tested positive. It‚Äôs doubly difficult to make arrangements for medical treatment and a hospital bed on the phone but we‚Äôve had a breakthrough and he was assessed by field medic yesterday who said he‚Äôs better off isolating at home away from the potential risks in hospital Covid wards. Today he will begin taking antiviral tablets so we hope that he‚Äôs caught the milder variant and pray that the tablets will help him fight off the virus and avoid hospitalisation.

Also, the people of Ukraine need all the help they can get. I‚Äôve chosen to donate to UNHCR for providing humanitarian lifesaving assistance to the families in need. If you‚Äôd like to help please visit https://www.unhcr.org/uk/

Le parole della guerra

Assedio 
operazione militare che mira a impadronirsi di una piazzaforte*.
Dal latino *adsƒïdƒ≠u(m) per obsidium, derivato di obsidƒìre ‚Äúoccupare il campo‚Äù.
*luogo munito di fortificazioni
Es. "La citt√† √® sotto assedio."

Coprifuoco
divieto di uscire di sera per ragioni di sicurezza e ordine pubblico in circostanze di emergenza.
Composto di coprire e fuoco, sul modello del francese couvre-feu.
Es. "Durante il coprifuoco nessuno cammina per le strade della capitale."

Rifugiato
chi abbandona il proprio paese per rifugiarsi in un altro stato.
Dal latino ref≈≠gƒ≠u(m), derivato di refugƒïre "rifuggire".
Es. "Secondo le stime dell'ONU, i rifugiati ucraini sarebbero gi√† pi√π di 660.000" (dato del 2 marzo 2022 https://www.unhcr.org/it/cosa-facciamo/emergenze/ucraina/).

Resistenza
movimento di lotta, spesso armata, contro qualsiasi oppressione che metta a rischio i diritti fondamentali dell'uomo. 
Dal tardo latino resistƒïntƒ≠a(m), derivato di resƒ≠stƒïre "resistere".
Es. "La resistenza si sta battendo strenuamente per difendere il paese."

Stato di allerta
segnale di allarme per un pericolo imminente.
Dalla locuzione all‚Äôerta.
Es. "Putin ha messo in allerta le forze di deterrenza del paese." 
L'espressione risale al peroodo della 
 guerra fredda. Ora si riferisce a una controffensiva nei confronti di chi supporta l'Ucraina, che, tra le altre cose, prevede anche un potenziale ricorso degli armamenti nucleari.

Tregua
sospensione provvisoria del conflitto.
Dal latino medievale trƒïwa(m), dal longobardo *trewwa (nel tedesco moderno Treue ‚Äúfedelt√†‚Äù).
Es. "I due eserciti hanno fatto una tregua."

Cessate il fuoco
locuzione di comando (invariabile) con cui si ordina di smettere di sparare.
Viene usata come sinonimo di "tregua".
Dal latino cessƒÅre, frequentativo di cedƒïre "cedere" e dal latino f≈ècu(m) ‚Äúfocolare‚Äù, di origine incerta.
Es. "√à stato stabilito un cessate il fuoco."

Delegazione 
gruppo di individui che ha la funzione di rapprentare una nazione o un'associazione.
Dal latino delegati≈çne(m), dal latino delƒìgƒÅre, composto di de- "via da" e legƒÅre "dare un incarico".
Es. "Si sono conclusi i colloqui tra le delegazioni russa e ucraina."

Roadway is built on the values of empathy and respect for one another. We believe that we are all in it together, and we care about every community - even communities that are thousands of miles away. We are all feeling deeply for the people directly impacted by the Ukrainian-Russian Crisis. We believe that feeling for our fellow humans is important, but actions can make a difference. It‚Äôs time to act. 

Every day for the next week, Roadway trucks will be parked in different locations around the city to collect donations. For every donation we receive, Roadway Moving will match it. If you donate a box of diapers, Roadway will, too. We will match the donations of our fellow New Yorkers up to $50,000.
 
Here are the items needed by Ukrainians right now:
 
‚Ä¢	Baby/Infant products: diapers, baby soap/shower gel, formula, pacifiers, newborn clothes, baby bottles
‚Ä¢	Pet supplies, especially food 
‚Ä¢	Women‚Äôs pads, soaps, disinfectant, shampoo, deodorant
‚Ä¢	First AID kits (sterile gauze, band-aids)
‚Ä¢	Multivitamins, protein bars, tea bags
‚Ä¢	Sleeping bags, blankets/heating blankets, bed linen
‚Ä¢	Shoes, and especially socks for children, women, and men
‚Ä¢	PLEASE ONLY DONATE NEW, UNOPENED ITEMS!
 
According to The UN Refugee Agency (www.unhcr.org), as of March 1st, 874,026 people have fled Ukraine to
neighboring countries. They need our help. 

Stay tuned to see where the trucks are, we will share this on our social media channels: Instagram, Facebook, Twitter, and LinkedIn. Please share with your friends and followers when you spot one of our trucks so they can donate, too!

üìå Our colleague is at the border crossing in Siret, Romania, where thousands of children and their mothers are fleeing the war in #Ukraine every day. Crossing the border, that‚Äôs when they all allow themselves a little moment of joy, but then they seem to get confused again and become sad. There are dozens, even hundreds of people who are ready to help, but for children everything is probably overwhelming.

‚ùó There is still a great need for translators and food ‚Äì the organised centres in the area are starting to run out of supplies that were provided in the first few days.

üë® üè≠ Today, NGO representatives are meeting again with the authorities on the ground to discuss major needs and way to address them. We hope that the organisation of the space will be soon improved to make the triage and access to services much easier.

Official data showed yesterday, March 2, that since the beginning of the war, more than one million people fled Ukraine. Source: üîóhttps://data2.unhcr.org/en/situations/ukraine

üíôüíõ You can support our work in Ukraine and with refugees from Ukraine here: üîó Link in the BIO

üì∑ by Mihai Enache

We are saddened by the continued war in Ukraine, where innocent people are suffering and live in fear. To help those in need, Epiroc is donating SEK 1 million to UNHCR to support humanitarian needs in Ukraine and neighboring countries. ‚ÄúThe development in Ukraine is horrifying and we want to support the people that are in need of relief, protection and assistance due to the war‚Äù, says Helena Hedblom, Epiroc‚Äôs President and CEO. 
Read more about UNHCR here: https://www.unhcr.org Photo: UNHCR. 
#Epiroc #UNHCR #United #Inspired

Russia‚Äôs invasion of Ukraine is a severe violation of International law and is causing a humanitarian crisis.

In order to show solidarity with our Ukrainian colleagues, their families and the brave Ukrainian people, starting tomorrow, Tuesday 8 March, our e-scooters will blink in the colours of the Ukrainian flag every day between 12:00 hrs and 13:00 hrs for the next two weeks. We will donate the revenue from the scooters during that time to UNHCR (United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees). üá∫üá¶

We are also taking the following actions:

- Stopping all business activities in Russia and Belarus, including the reselling of refurbished vehicles.

- Selling our minority stake in a Russian micromobility company. We will support their employees wanting to move to Europe in the ways we can, including with finding jobs where applicable.

- Supporting our friends at Meds, Kry and Sjukv√•rdshj√§lpen and others with getting medical supplies into Ukraine.

We want to encourage everyone to contribute in any way they can to show solidarity with the people of Ukraine. Donate to UNHCR on their website: donate.unhcr.org/sg/en-sg/general #StandWithUkraine #SlavaUkraini

I Bravida har vi stor tro p√• at fred og et trygt bomilj√∏ er en grunnleggende menneskerettighet, og det som skjer i Ukraina akkurat n√• f√∏les nesten uvirkelig.

I dag donerer alle Bravida-konsernets land, Sverige, Norge, Danmark og Finland, en samlet sum p√• 1 million svenske kroner til UNHCR (FNs h√∏ykommiss√¶r for flyktninger), som er p√• stedet med n√∏dhjelp til familier p√• flukt. Mange av dem er kvinner og barn som for tiden er i en ekstra s√•rbar situasjon, og p√• bakgrunn av dette velger vi i Bravida √• donere bel√∏pet i dag, p√• den internasjonale kvinnedagen.

Bravida har donert til UNHCR for √• st√∏tte barn, kvinner og familier p√• flukt. Vil du lese mer om hvordan UNCHR st√∏tter trengende, kan du f√∏lge denne lenken: https://donate.unhcr.org/int/en/ukraine-emergency?gclid=Cj0KCQiA95aRBhCsARIsAC2xvfwbZVf9VWZqI7jOcpqlWjGnOW0VPHaaUWsSRrSSbxlUqwDHmb5dxJcaAvNZEALw_wcB&gclsrc=aw.ds

We've been all watching for the last week with great sorrow and dismay what is happening in Ukraine. As a social enterprise whose purpose is to help support and empower refugee women from Syria, our hearts and prayers go out to everyone facing this tragedy or whose loved ones are in harm's way. We hope and call on everyone receiving families and persons escaping the war to provide them with safe passage, shelter, and support. The people of Ukraine deserve our unwavering support as they try to piece their lives back together. 

To make a difference in the lives of everyone in Ukraine, we encourage you to make a donation (anything counts!) to the Emergency Fund for Ukraine created by the United Nations High Commission for Refugees (UNHCR) to: https://donate.unhcr.org/int/en/ukraine-emergency

Photo Credit: @everydayrefugees

As the numbers continue to rise, our hearts go out to the now 2.3 million people that have already fled Ukraine and to the millions more whose lives have been completely devastated ‚ù§Ô∏è

Source: UNHCR (data2.unhcr.org/en/situations/ukraine)

In this newsletter, we share with you updates and stories where your immediate response to our call for support in Ukraine allowed us to provide emergency assistance and protection as the crisis continues to develop.
 
We thank you for joining the global community ‚Äì governments, communities, organizations, and individuals like yourself ‚Äì in heeding the call for support when and where the need is most urgent.
 
In the Philippines, we continue to work with the Government and partners to strengthen the protection space for refugees, stateless persons, asylum seekers, and the internally displaced ‚Äì ensuring that their rights are protected, and they have access to essential programs and services.
 
üîó Read the latest newsletter here: https://www.unhcr.org/ph/newsletters [Link in Bio]

The solidarity shown by individual donors who have heeded the call for support helps provide life-saving assistance and protection, to those displaced by the war inside Ukraine, as well as some of the millions of refugees seeking safety across borders. 
üîó Read more: unhcr.org/ph/newsletters

Liudmila and her daughter are among 30,000 refugees from Ukraine in Moldova who have received cash grants from UNHCR. Liudmila wants to send part of the money to her vulnerable parents and grandparents back home. This week @marcelotwelve and @claricealves have started an important project with ACNUR, the UN agency that protects and provides assistance to refugees, displaced and stateless people worldwide.

Because of the war in Ukraine
